name: Strawberry Trifle Recipe | Rida Aftab | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Strawberry Trifle Recipe: Mlik 1 litre Strawberry 250 gms Rabri 250 gms Sugar 1 cup Green Jelly 1 packet Red Jelly 1 packet Finely Chopped Almonds 50 gms Cake Ras 100 gms Custard Powder (strawberry flavor) 1 tsp Vanilla Essence 1 tsp Butter 1 tbsp
instructions: In a pan, boil milk add sugar. In a custard powder add water and dissolve. When mixture is thick, add vanilla essence and butter. In a pan, add water green jelly , red jelly and cook. Let it cool custard, add strawberry. In a dish, spread cake ras and pour custard. After this add rabri and jelly. In the end, garnish with finely chopped almonds and serve.
